duties_responsibilities.duty: Select, develop and motivate personnel within the department. Provide career development for subordinates. Provide prompt and effective coaching and counseling.
Manage the preparation, review and submission of financial packages for quarterly and annual financial statement consolidation.
Review and approve monthly surplus computations and related cash transfers.
Manage the accounting of investment pool fund activities ensuring cash and investment balances are reconciled and properly supported.
Manage all aspects of bond accounting including bonds backed by tolling revenues for capital programs and those backed by various state revenues for transit and commuter capital programs.
Directly handle internal and external auditor requests and provide proper supporting documentation and analysis to satisfy annual audits.
Manage the review and analysis of Lease Accounting and other relevant accounting standards.
Other duties or projects as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Accounting, Finance, or a related field (Master’s preferred)
